full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 105 of 261 1266 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 Q. Now, you maintained email correspondence with Epstein even after he was in jail, didn't you? 2 A. I don't recall. 3 Q. I'm going to ask you to look at what's been marked as 3513-014. 4 5 THE COURT: I don't have a tab number. 6 7 MS. STERNHEIM: I'll put it on the screen, Judge. 8 THE COURT: Ms. Pomerantz, do you have that? 9 MS. POMERANTZ: I do. Thank you, your Honor. 10 THE COURT: Okay. You can put it on the screen. 11 BY MS. STERNHEIM: 12 Q. Just going back for a moment, the correspondence that you had with Epstein concerning pictures which you claim you didn't send him was in 2008; correct? 13 14 A. If that's what it said, then that would be accurate. 15 16 Q. Okay. And you don't deny that you had email correspondence with him 17 A. I do not deny that. 18 19 Q. Okay. Now, looking at this next exhibit, 3513-014, do you see that? 20 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. Do you recognize that to be email correspondence that you had with Jeffrey Epstein? 23 24 A. Yes. 25 Q. Correspondence that you had with him in 2011? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018442
